title: Log in
body:
The last time i was able to log in was  03/06/2016- I have tryied every thing that had been suggested like recovery of name and PW- and have  received one email talking about how there is a long list of stuff and they will get to my problem when its my turn - its been a few weeks ago.
It shows i am logged in to my account on this web site but when i go to settings its asking me to log in, ??? why?? - but nothing i put in for user name or PW is working!!  i have not been banned - and i dont think i have been hacked,My son got me playing this game and he said that my champ(account) has not been logged into- I have all my usernames and PW on a note pad on desk top for every game i play and use ctrl-v to input PW's,so i know i am not putting in the wrong info. Can some one explain this? I would really like to play again!!!! i thought about starting a new account but if i do then i will be playing that one and not working on fixing this log in problem to my account. ANY DEV input will be appreciated as long as it is some thing i have not already tryied! like requesting username or PW- resetting username or PW. Or opening a support ticket. Dig deep DEV's  HEP MEH!! HEP MEH NOW!!!

PS-  (Typo's came with my keyborde and i cant uninstall them) so plz no grammar nazi's - LOL funny huh!!!!

replies.body:
I looked into your account a bit and I'm seeing some unusual activity which may indicate the account was compromised, which is likely why it's asking you to re-log in when you click "Settings" on the website.

Since this involves a potentially compromised account, we'd need to do a quick verification of ownership before returning the account.  In the meantime, I placed a temporary suspension on the account to prevent any unauthorized changes.  I know you mentioned some hesitation to do so, but can you go ahead and [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=38154)? Unfortunately we don't have a way to accept and verify personal information (i.e. e-mails, purchase histories, etc.) outside of our ticketing system.  

It's a bit long, but just add in what you know and we'll get it sorted out for you :)  Lemme know if you run into any problems with the process

I have submited a ticket but on just the fact that i cant log in-do i need to do another on the posability of a hacked acount?
Also  Even though i am logged in to website and its asking me for login info (witch does not work) to see my support ticket- how do i log in to see my support ticket? Is it sent to my E-mail add?- if the account is hack then they have changed my e-mail add to the account. right?
I have submited the ticket.  ty for the responce- GO GET EM!!!!!!!!!!!!! Smite the B__tards!!
yep i have tried it over and over.. :/

> [{quoted}](name=Zethron Raizz,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0pWkE0Q7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-22T15:55:06.845+0000)
>
> yep i have tried it over and over.. :/

Even after you reset your password it's still not working? Repair the client maybe?

thx.
im sorry if im boring
i just want to ask you,do you have problems with log in?
Here writes "We're aware of a problem causing login attempts to fail,and are working on fix"

I forgot to ask you,
That was two-three days ago,i stay out of power and my street havent got power,and Riot gives me AFK,How to explain to Riot to i stay with out power????
create support ticket is about the only way- if you can find a phone number for the techs try that.
Pls answer to me,when i could log in to my League of Legends account?
Have you tried this yet? http://prntscr.com/aijd1u
